g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: COPY-NEAREST
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start gspc-util-copy-attributes (the spc-special-cause-violation-checker nearest to the item, the item)

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: initially for any gspc-util-workspace-border-corner WB for any gspc-util-thin-workspace-border-corner TWB connected to WB unconditionally conclude that WB is gspc-util-related-to TWB

for any gspc-util-workspace-border-corner WSB for any gspc-util-thin-workspace-border-corner TWSB that is gspc-util-related-to WSB whenever WSB is moved then in order move TWSB to ((if WSB is a gspc-util-lower-left-workspace-border-corner then the item-x-position of WSB + 15 else the item-x-position of WSB - 15), (if WSB is a gspc-util-lower-left-workspace-border-corner then the item-y-position of WSB + 15 else the item-y-position of WSB - 15)) and make TWSB permanent and change the size of the workspace of WSB to minimum and make the workspace of WSB permanent

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: REVERSE-BORDER-COLORS
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the item is a gspc-util-border-corner and (the item is not a gspc-util-thin-border-corner and the item is not a gspc-util-workspace-border-corner) and there exists a gspc-util-border-corner connected to the item

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: DELETE-BORDERS
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: there exists a gspc-util-border-corner connected to the item

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: INITIALIZE-BORDER
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the item is a gspc-util-border-corner and the item is not a gspc-util-lower-left-workspace-border-corner and not (there exists a gspc-util-border-corner connected to the item)

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: for any gspc-util-border-corner B whenever B is moved by the user and when not (there exists a gspc-util-border-corner connected to B) and the workspace of B is not the same object as the subworkspace of gspc-util-borders-pallet then start gspc-util-create-borders (B)

for any gspc-util-border-corner B whenever B is moved by the user and when the workspace of B is the same object as the subworkspace of gspc-util-borders-pallet then in order make B transient and delete B

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT:
gspc-util-inform-the-operator (TEXT: text, W: class g2-window)
begin if W is the same object as gspc-util-all-g2-windows then for W = each g2-window do allow other processing; start uil-post-generic-dialog (TEXT, the symbol message, the symbol large, W, the symbol uil-information-icon); end else call uil-post-generic-dialog (TEXT, the symbol message, the symbol large, W, the symbol uil-information-icon); end

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: This is the largest workspace that fits on a low resolution monitor.

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: CREATE-SMALL-LABEL
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the attribute-name of the item exists
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: in order create an gspc-util-display-only-message M and change the text of M to "[capitalize-words ("[the attribute-name of the item]")]:" and transfer M to the workspace of the item at (fun-left-edge (the item) - (the item-width of M / 2), the item-y-position of the item) and change the border-color of M to transparent and make M permanent

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: CREATE-LARGE-LABEL
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the attribute-name of the item exists
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: in order create an gspc-util-large-display-only-message M and change the text of M to "[capitalize-words ("[the attribute-name of the item]")]:" and transfer M to the workspace of the item at (fun-left-edge (the item) - (the item-width of M / 2), the item-y-position of the item) and change the border-color of M to transparent and make M permanent

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: non-menu choices for gspc-util-object include: do-not-clear-text-for-edit-in-place;
